plotpoints.m

some possible variations on parameters for vtkplotpoints

%% generate data
nPoints = 100;
xmax=30;
ymax=30;
zmax=30;

points = [randint(1,nPoints,xmax); randint(1,nPoints,ymax); randint(1,nPoints,zmax)]';
points = points.*2;

pointLabels = linspace(1, 100, size(points, 1))';

pointColors = [1, 1, 1, 1;
                length(pointLabels)/2, 1, 1, 0.1;
                length(pointLabels), 1, 0, 0];

pointSize=2;

%% single color
vtkplotpoints(points)
vtkshow
vtkdestroy


%% auto color lut, default point size
vtkplotpoints(points, pointLabels)
vtkshow
vtkdestroy

%% plot with all parameters
vtkplotpoints(points, pointLabels, pointColors, 'pointSize', 3.0, 'thetaResolution', 16, 'phiResolution', 16)
vtkshow
vtkdestroy
Generated on Wed Sep 30 17:31:11 2009 for matVTK by  1.5.8
